website_summaries.verdict: Customers needing an affordable comforter to keep warm during any season will appreciate this no-nonsense model.
pros: Outer microfiber fabric offers users an ultra-soft comforter
Buyers enjoy the bright white, clean look of the blanket
Keeps users warm in harsh winter weather
cons: May feel a little too warm for some if inserted into a duvet

customer_reviews.title: After reading a few recent reviews that say it looks like small stains or dried boogers
customer_reviews.text: After ordering this product, I have gotten bed bugs. Very small amount, but I have not traveled, have not had visitors, or brought anything else into my home that could have brought on an infestation. This is the only change I have made. After reading a few recent reviews that say it looks like small stains or dried boogers, perhaps dead bugs? I have been overly cautious and quite frankly OCD about cleanliness and inspecting for bed bugs my entire life. Can't believe this has happened and this is the only thing I can think of that could have brought them into my home.
customer_reviews.author: ked

customer_reviews.title: Ruined after wash
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a new bed and searched everywhere for a comforter I liked. I read all the reviews on this and thought it would be perfect. I received it quickly and upon unboxing I placed in the washer like I do with all new bedding. I washed it per the instructions and dried it as suggested. When I retrieved it from my dryer there were orange marks on the white side and it was stiff in some spots. I now need to look elsewhere for a comforter for my bed. I had such high hopes with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hughes

customer_reviews.title: We now have bed bugs!
customer_reviews.text: After ordering this comforter we are war with a bed bug infestation. Most likely we receive a comforter that had been returned and was full of bed bugs. There is no other explanation as to why we bed bugs. No trips were taken, and no one has visited us. The comforter is the only new item in our equation. Order from a different company!
customer_reviews.author: Candy Pravecek

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected and very pleased. For $24 it is a steal
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected and very pleased. For $24 it is a steal..clean..bright white..soft..fluffy. It is not a $300 down comforter so if that is what you are expecting...spend $300 on a down comforter. I just toss a thin quilt or fleece throw on top and it is fantastic for sleeping in Denver.
customer_reviews.author: James T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Fluffy and soft!
customer_reviews.text: After a couple years of owning this one. It has survived many of my bleached washes, in fact about 1 x a week and it has the softness and fluff back everytime. Keeps me warm in winter and not hot in the summer. I absolutely love my quilted comforter that is perfect inside my duvet. Great quality buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Came with dead bugs inside!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this duvet last year for my own bed and loved it so I ordered 2 for my daughters beds. I was horrified to open the one to find dead bugs folded inside the air tight package. They actually looked like lice but my daughter is saying they looked like dead baby bed bugs. Didn't open the second one because they came in the same box. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. True white color, put on bed 2 weeks now (end of summer) & it's not too hot infact just about right. We have CA king bed & it's give a nice hang as some comforters leave nothing to hang over they just stick out. About to wash it for 1st time, I'm thinking of taking it to the laundromat to one of their large machines. I'm hoping everything stays intact with no bunching as the reviews suggests Will update it anything seems off. I'm very satisfied with this purchase and it looks great on our bed, my husband likes it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight and Warm
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my favorite blanket now. It's light and it keeps me warm at night. My husband has a severe allergy to most fillings in blankets and this one hasn't triggered any issues. We're about to wash the duvet for the first time since purchasing since my son spilled chocolate milk on it and it went through the duvet cover. So we'll see how it holds up to the gentle cycle, cold water, and an air tumble dry.
customer_reviews.author: Annette L.

customer_reviews.title: A no brainer
customer_reviews.text: What a bargain! This comforter came quickly and is just perfect! Very nice material and I am thrilled with it. The manufacturer packaging is nice enough to gift wrap as is and would be a welcome addition to about anyones home. I did not like that it was made in China (^%&!!) but I suppose that is what keeps the price low. To achieve the drape shown in the photo, I would order a size up. The queen does not cover the bed and boxpring. I may get a king size and use this as a spare for my guest bedroom.A
customer_reviews.author: SexySadie

customer_reviews.title: Super soft & comfy
customer_reviews.text: Just as all the other reviews stated, this comforter comes folded in an air tight bag. As soon as I opened the bag it definitely started to fluff up. I am overall very happy with this purchase. It’s super soft and pretty. It does feel more light weight than some others but I think it will be perfect at night. I do sleep with sheets and a throw blanket on my bed though. This fits my queen size bed perfectly; it’s the same size as my previous Calvin Klein queen comforter. It is a little wrinkled from the packaging but I plan on throwing in the dryer to help. Overall 10/10 for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Love this comforter! I bought this on an Amazon lightening deal for $35. Where are you gonna buy a King size comforter for that price?! It is made very nice and great quality. I recommend washing & drying it at a laundromat that has the large oversized washers & dryers that are made to handle large comforters. The really large dyers help fluff it up and doesn’t end up in a ball. I highly recommend this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Suezq

customer_reviews.title: don’t waste your money and time
customer_reviews.text: I read all bedbugs reviews and I wanted to wash before I use. However, it turns out this product is not washable. it fell apart after first wash. I wanted to return and mention my problem but they want their product back. How I supposed to send this product after open the vacuum bag. I ordered from amazon because I dont have a car and time. If I take uber, it will cost me a lot so I decided to not send it back. Now I have an useless duvet which has a huge ripped spot in the center. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: merf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Comforter
customer_reviews.text: My expectations were perfectly met with this comforter. It was warm and cozy. With the chill weather i was able to sleep very warm with this comforter.. Happy with the purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Khwaja Mohaideen

customer_reviews.title: amazing. buy 2 just incase!
customer_reviews.text: This was an inexpensive, SUPER SUPER SOFT, comforter. Until my duvet cover arrives I'll just have it underneath my comforter, but this is seriously the most comfortable, plush down comf I've ever had. My cats also really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Kittykins

customer_reviews.title: Worst gift I ever got myself
customer_reviews.text: Well, when I originally reviewed this, I was really happy with my purchase. But, it's now ripped after 2 washes. This is kept on a guest bed and only slept with a handful of times, so I'm pretty disappointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennalenna

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, Excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: I almost did not purchase this after reading some of the reviews, but I am very glad that I did. This duvet is soft and fluffed up nice out of the bag. The box was a little small and the duvet was busting out, however it was inside two plastic casings so was safe. I cannot wait to sleep with it. It also has the loops in the four corners to make it easy to place in a duvet cover. What an excellent buy for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: SHANNON

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase, would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve bought this blanket - once for myself and once for my mom. We both love it! It’s inexpensive, simple, lightweight but warm, and a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Comforter came with a huge rip!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comforter for my parents for Christmas, and they thought it was fine initially. But, be sure to check your blanket CAREFULLY because there was a huge rip in the blanket when they got it. Is this a statement to the durability of the blanket? You would think that a "new" product would not have a huge hole. If you look at the pictures, it's really hard to tell if there is a hole / rip because everything is white, so be sure to check your blanket carefully. Or else, you can also just buy from another retailer that has some quality control in the products.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The duvet is nice and works well in the duvet cover that I purchased. I am giving it four stars because it is not as puffy and thick as I expected or that some reviews described. I wanted more weight to it and I was looking for that “hotel feel” in a duvet. It will work well in the warmer months, but I think in the winter I am going to need something a little thicker. The quality is good and if you’re looking for something that’s not too heavy, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LBS

customer_reviews.title: Beware not washer friendly!
customer_reviews.text: It looked promising but unfortunately when I took it out of the packaging and wash it, it did not hold up with the wash. When I took it out the fabric began to tear and the stuff on the inside created stains in random spots. I am definitely going to return this!
customer_reviews.author: Yours truly Leo

customer_reviews.title: I can say I think Utopias is a better quality and a lot fluffier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my bed and the Utopia for my daughters room. I can say I think Utopias is a better quality and a lot fluffier. I wish I would have paid the extra $9 for the Utopia brand for my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent but better selections elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this in April of 2018. Finally got around to replacing it a few days ago. This comforter started out great but it definitely does not fit a king size bed. This blankets sleeps pretty warm. I felt compelled to come back and leave a review because I replaced with a Target comforter at the same price and soooo much nicer to sleep with.
customer_reviews.author: lexygrey218

customer_reviews.title: Will make you late for work!
customer_reviews.text: I had a comforter from Ikea, but it was just not warm enough during the winter. I was tired of freezing my butt off because apparently my new apartment's heater is trash. So I was the hunt for something fluffy, and something warm, and this definitely fit the bill. I was so surprised how soft it was. The fluffy might be a matter of perspective, I've never had a real down comforter or something suuuuper fluffy. But it's def fluffy enough for me, making me late for work because I can't wake up. :D
customer_reviews.author: C.Leong

customer_reviews.title: WARNING--This Comforter Sleeps HOT!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a decent night's sleep since we started using this comforter. I wake up soaked in sweat, despite lowering the heat and opening windows. I ordered this comforter in September in preparation for the cold weather and just recently opened it, so unfortunately the window to return has closed. BEWARE of this comforter if you are a warm sleeper! Go with natural fibers instead (I've learned my lesson).
customer_reviews.author: Pingy385

customer_reviews.title: Wow. . .just. . .wow.
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, where to start? This duvet is warm, it's comfortable, it's almost perfect. The reason I say "almost" and still give it five stars is this, I wanted fluffy and snuggly like a real down comforter. However, this thing is like being draped in one of those fluffy summer clouds that keeps you comfortably toasty while weighing next to nothing. I am a hot sleeper and this duvet keeps me at a good temperature all night. It's super soft goes great with my microfiber sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Tim R

customer_reviews.title: arrived torn and damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it arrived with a 8 inch gash in the side with stuffing falling out. The material it's made of its extremely thin and brittle and there is no way it would withstand a wash as advertised. When i pulled to see the strength of the sewn pattern it literally tore easier than paper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible quality it’s a blanket not a comforter beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: NOT down alternative
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy again!! This comforter is definitely NOT down alternative. I wish I would’ve gone to Ross or Marshalls and buy me a better quality comforter instead. The inside is made with that cheap pillow stuffing. I live in So Cal and in the winter it can get as low as 39 degrees. I found myself waking up sweating when I started using this comforter (and I’m not one to sweat much). Additionally, it is NOT for all seasons. I have reverted back to my real down alternative and it does not compare!! Not worth the buy/money.
customer_reviews.author: ElleVee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I live in northern Colorado and needed a new down comforter. Because we recently added a puppy to our family, I didn’t want to spend a lot of money in the event he chewed it up, so I took a chance and bought this one thinking it would be alright until he got through his puppy stage. I wasn’t expecting much. I’m glad to say that this down-alternative comforter is so warm and comfy. It’s lightweight, very soft and covers our king sized bed completely. No more pulling covers from my husband. I’m going to purchase another one for my guest room. I’m very happy with this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh T

customer_reviews.title: So soft I bought a second one!
customer_reviews.text: And this one is the softest, most easily washed blanket or comforter I've ever owned. And inexpensive to boot! I just wish it came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: kantbear

customer_reviews.title: All Season Quilted Duvet
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time last night. To back up, I always wash items before using. Washed on delicate cycle, dried on low in my front loading machines. Turned out fine. Put in a duvet cover, fairly easy to handle. Used last nigh for the first time. Was amazed how warm it was and the extra weight it provided. So far I really am glad I made this purchase. Ordered king for a queen sized bed --- works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Choptank Gram

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This feels nothing like down or a down alternative. This comforter feels like it is barely filled with cheap cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan A Bush

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed when I opened the package
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I opened the package.. the comforter was stained when I unfolded it and it looked as though the comforter was used it has hair woven into the fabric. Very disappointed and disgusted
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Middleton

customer_reviews.title: NOT A COTTON SPREAD. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a queen in same brand. It was so lovely with puffy light weight outer cotton fabric, that I bought in twin too. However the twin barely has any filling. Outer fabric is a cheap shiny outer polyester fabric. I’ll update my review if the manufacturers replaces product as it’s described without requiring the hassle of a UPS return for this significantly inferior spread.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: I want to wear this comforter it's so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this comforter about once a year because the bright white color never stays true; however, it is the perfect comforter for both winter and summer nights. It is so soft and silky and priced so low, I do not mind spending the money to replace it every year. LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Puffed up immediately upon removal from packaging; no weird smell! Lightweight and warm (and holds heat well). Stitching looks strong and neat, as do the duvet ties.
customer_reviews.author: Makayla

customer_reviews.title: A little heavier than I wanted but it serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it would be a little more light weight since I live on the east coast where it doesn't get super cold. I also get very hot when I sleep. It is a super soft and warm insert though. We do have issues with sweating at night especially when our pets were sleeping with us. We had to kick them out because heat would just get trapped under and it would get overwhelmingly hot. I may invest in a thinner one for summer and keep this one for winter because it is very soft and nice for the price especially.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight to warmth ratio
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've had this for almost a week. I am at "the age" when I sometimes get night sweats so having something that will keep me comfortably warm yet not be too heavy is really important. The price was right and quality is good. It's always nice to get these with the little tabs at the corners to help secure it in the duvet cover. I would recommend this and may purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeneroo2u

customer_reviews.title: Nice duvet
customer_reviews.text: I like this duvet. It is the first one I have ever gotten so I don't have anything to compare. But it is durable. It is easy for me to keep clean because I got a cover for it. It is not really light weight though. Maybe compared to others it is but it is really hot at night and I sleep with a fan and at times crack my bedroom window at night in the winter. I don't like being hot. I still like the look of it on my bed though; I just have to kick it off during the night. My dog burrows under it at night; she loves the warmth it provides her old tired bones.
customer_reviews.author: tommi

customer_reviews.title: Fabulously light and stays up like a sublime cave
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2nd one. Love them! I have 3 others that are real goose down one Purple and much thicker yet light Like these yet this one doesn't cost 400.00!!! We alternate them all. Of course the others are real goose dwn and King size. I was going to order King in this one but no need to and price is still inexpensive yet awesome quality. Gave my other one for my dogs Orthopedic beds looks and feels nice for them too when they nap during day time.
customer_reviews.author: Deepblue

customer_reviews.title: One year later - still loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comforter about a year ago when I moved to my first apartment and it's still one of my favorite purchases. It's so lightweight and comfortable while still providing warmth. I use it year round. (I just add a blanket on top during the Wisconsin winters). Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rice

customer_reviews.title: Other than what appears to be a blood stain
customer_reviews.text: It might be okay. I took it out of the vacuum seal. It's super soft but so far not very fluffy. Not sure if a wash and dry will remove what appears to be a blood stain (ewwww) and/or add some fluff. Deciding now whether to try to stuff it back in the box and return it but agh, the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: ReadWriteRepeat

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend purchasing this comforter
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is thinner than I expected. Definitely not for all seasons as described because it would be rather thin for cold months. Aside from how thin it is, I have stitching coming apart and have owned it for less than a week - that's unacceptable. I can only imagine how it'll start falling apart after washing it. Quality Assurance does not appear to be the top priority.
customer_reviews.author: Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter!
customer_reviews.text: OMG this comforter is so great. Cozy, puffy, warm! Looks good, no holes or rips. Bright white! I am a bedding freak and usually only buy cotton blankets. Well I’m glad I decided to try this and will buy a couple more when needed for my house. It is not heavy, but is quite warm. I do run a bit hot after being asleep, so I’m not surprised. If you are looking for sometbing light - this would probably not be it. Im using this for a comforter without a duvet cover, so I’m not sure about that aspect. I’m sure it would be fine. So great! And the price is definitely right!
customer_reviews.author: Martha M

customer_reviews.title: I like this comforter a lot - it was very affordable ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this comforter a lot - it was very affordable and simple, and it looks clean and crisp on your bed in the classic white color! Although this is not a heavy comforter by any means, it still proves to be a tad too warm for us so we haven't been able to use it during the summer here in the south. I was hoping to find an all-season comforter, but I do think this will be plenty suited for the fall and winter. We have put it through the washer with no complications, as well!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you the perfect temperature
customer_reviews.text: Package was light and clean, a few specks on the comforter but easily flicked off. I like comforters that are warm but feel almost cool to the touch when you move around, and this was perfect! Comforting weight, kept me warm but I wasn't sweating or too hot at any point in the night (live in northern cali, no ac). Super soft but will be putting a duvet cover on it because it seems to attract dust/hair.
customer_reviews.author: aromatherapy

customer_reviews.title: Great duvet!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this a really nice, quality duvet. The white is a very bright white, so you may want to end up getting a duvet cover to preserve the color. I also recommend this because I’ve read reviews of it not turning out too well after being machine washed so getting a cover could eliminate that. It is very soft and warm, but not too warm. I definitely recommend buying a size up from what your bed size is if you want some extra to hang off the sides or if you and your partner like to hog the blanket. Really good experience with shipping as well, it got here super fast! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany A

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, fluffy, and oh so COZY!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I only used real down comforters for years but they shed so awfully, I thought I needed to try something else. This arrived quickly and came in a vacuum sealed package with a handle that was really convenient, considering I have my packages delivered to my office. I brought it home and went to unzip the seal, and it is seriously so fluffy and soft. I got the queen size and it is so fantastically warm and cozy that I ordered a second one for extra warmth, and I couldn’t be more pleased with this. I have slept amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Marfell

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter! Give it a try.
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter! I spent FOREVER reading through reviews, in hopes of finding the perfect comforter to replace my current white comforter. I decided to try this one on a whim when I saw it on sale for only $22. Wow!!! I love it. It’s cool to watch it inflate as soon as you take it out of the packaging. The material is super soft and the comforter is lightweight, making it perfect for spring or summer, but will also be great for colder months if you use a throw blanket over it. I haven’t washed the blanket yet so I cannot say how it’ll hold up, but so far I highly recommend this comforter!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Rohrbacher

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! I was afraid it wouldn’t be as fluffy as I wanted, but I was pleasantly surprised. It’s perfect to snuggle up in at night and definitely keeps us warm. While you could technically use this as is without a duvet cover, I will be using it inside a duvet (once I find the perfect one!). This arrived clean and nicely packaged and puffed up immediately after taking it out of the vacuum sealed packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how nice this comforter is for under $35.00 .... I will steam the wrinkles from it. There are loops all around the perimeter, in case you want to use a duvet cover with it. Great year round weight. I have not washed it yet but feel that if I put it in a commercial washer/dryer (my washer is too small), it will wash and dry just fine. The fabric is substantial and very soft. If you're needing an inexpensive comforter that looks great, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: cupcake face

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO SMALL!!! What a joke.
customer_reviews.text: I have a king bed. I bought a king version of this item. I put it on my bed and laughed at what a joke it is. It doesn’t even come down to the bottom of my mattress and it CERTAINLY doesn’t fall as the photo displays. Perhaps they put a king sized comforter on a full sized bed for the picture. Sending back. What trash.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight warm comforter
customer_reviews.text: I have always owned down comforters. They were too heavy and hi maintenance. When I saw this blanket, especially at that price I had no choice but to buy it. It is light weight, warm and i am very pleased. I don't know how it will wear over time but so far so good. I did put a duvet cover to keep it cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: PamM

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but warm
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for. Lightweight, so I don't feel smothered, yet thick, comfortable and warm. Bought the first one in the wrong size, but it fit my daughters bed. After I used it a couple of nights I gave it to her and bought the right size one for my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Dd

customer_reviews.title: Buy it to sleep like a king!
customer_reviews.text: -update-- Has been washed like 5 times ready and bleached with hot water and still is as comfy as the first day. People love my blanket. If so buy another if it came in colors. White seems to get dirty to easy and I feel like a pit bull guarding it's babies. Gotta keep it white! _______ Very soft and comfy! Keeps you warm. A bit too warm if it's already warm inside. Wish it came in colors. Visitors love it. Will buy another for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Comforter!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for guests and they all complemented it and asked me where I purchased it. I wanted to get more and they finally became available again, a bit more expensive but still totally worth it. Also, great customer service. I ordered them and when I did I didn't realize that they would not be able to come in until the following week. I reached out and they expedited the shipping for free for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly in a duvet cover
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wanted a constellation motif in her bedroom, but the duvet cover required a comforter to place inside it. Checked reviews of various comforters and decided on this one. I washed and dried the comforter as directed, was wrinkle free after drying, placed it in the duvet , and the granddaughter was pleased as could be. I would buy this comforter again.
customer_reviews.author: JDDD

customer_reviews.title: LOVE  this
customer_reviews.text: WOW.. This is sooooo perfect.. Its pretty and lighweight .. but enough to keep you warm.. I use it in the summer.. but then also in Dec ,Jan & Feb to change up and use my RED'S for Christmas and Valentines day.. use red pillows and red blanket just for decoration at foot of bed..RED Pillows with christmas and valentines sayings on them sooo pretty against the white..
customer_reviews.author: sandy b

customer_reviews.title: Does not match the description
customer_reviews.text: Ummmm....... this is not the color I ordered. Color was suppose to be Navy Blue/Grey.... the color I got was depressing cloud grey/light grey. Goodness.... does not match the description at all. My sheets are grey and this almost matches my sheets. Overall the quality of the blank is great. I love how soft it is and it's not too heavy. I normally have an issue with getting too hot under blankets but I haven't had this issue with this blank.e
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G.

customer_reviews.title: Not soft enough for me
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with it when I got it just not very soft. I wanted my comforter to feel like a soft light fluffy cloud but this was pretty stiff and tougher than I was hoping for. If you’re looking for something more heavy duty or to put inside of a duvet cover I’m sure you’ll be happy with this, but it just wasn’t for me. Sadly I’m planning on returning.
customer_reviews.author: Christianna Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Do not bleach!
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable comforters I've ever owned, great price! Beautiful white fabric. I was so sad when I ruined my comforter by trying to get out a fabric softener stain by using bleach, it definitely is not bleach safe! I would dry clean only or use inside a duvet, also recommend if machine washing, make sure your washing tub is big enough to accommodate, it will float a bit, you have to push it down into the water multiple times
customer_reviews.author: Tonni Langford

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is absolutely, hands down the best product you could purchase on Amazon. It comes packaged air tight, and it fluffs up right away. Ive been using the blanket for about two weeks now and I am 100% satisfied. It is high quality, and I am honestly shocked that it is being sold at such a low price. I ordered a Queen size and it fits on the bed perfectly. It is exactly as pictured on the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I am soooo happy with this comforter. I bought mine at a store and my daughter fell in love with it. So I went online to find the same but in a twin size. She went crazy the day it arrived and has told me many times how cozy it is and how much she loves it. I machine washed it once since we've had it and nothing shifts or moves out of place. And the price is incredible. I will come back and buy more when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith c.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, more than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Despite its light weigh, I must say this comforter feels great and still manages to keep you warm without stifling you with heat. It’s definitely soft and has a more cotton like feel versus the usual synthetic down comforters. It doesn’t have that “noisy comforter sound”. The colors aren’t that vibrant but still goes well with my navy sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Ilecia Baboolal

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. I wanted a blanket for my sons room ASAP and I went ahead and ordered because of the price and color. I saw a good one at Costco I may order as well as it is better quality. I did wash the one from Amazon when it arrived. The stitching stayed together just fine. I did notice the color faded just after that first wash pretty significantly. I will use this blanket but would not order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Design Choice
customer_reviews.text: If you have things in your bedroom that you would like to pop (think accent pillow, a beautiful guitar, wall art, etc.), this comforter is a must. It is a pure, elegant white with a slight texture pattern. It's a perfect fit for a Sleep Number queen mattress. Interesting side fact: the square texturing makes it really easy to get centered on your bed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Best Amazon purchase yet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with the quality, look, feel, and overall shoppi g experience. The comforter was beyond my expectations and fluffed right up after opening the package. The price was a treat as well for sure good quality. I usually shop at discount stores like Ross or Marshalls and they don't have anything as nice for the price. My shopping experience was wonderful and I was contacted afterwards by the seller asking if I was satisfied which I very much appreciated. Thank you kindly Equinox!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: It’s like sleeping on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: Let me start of by saying I personally don’t think it’s an all season. I wake up super hot in it so it’s awesome for winter. Not sure if it’s because I have it in a duvet cover. But it is super fluffy like a cloud. My place doesn’t have the ac running so it usually 75-80 degrees in our place. So this maybe good for others that keep a cooler place in the summer. I’m still keeping it since it’s so comfortable I sleep great till I start sweating lol I’ll probably end up sleeping on top of it like my boyfriend does.
customer_reviews.author: Corina Enriquez

customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite amazon purchases. It’s scary to buy sheets but these are sooo soft. My husband has bad allergies to certain materials and these sheets don’t bother him at all. The comforter is perfect for a home kept in between 73-68 degrees. Warm but not dramatically thick to the point your melting. We will buy one more set because we love it so much. Oh and it looks just as good as it feels
customer_reviews.author: Stephy

customer_reviews.title: Feels like sleeping underneath a cloud
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this comforter and can't emphasize it enough!!! I didn't have high expectations when I first bought it because it was the cheapest one I found on Amazon. But don't let the price fool you - this comforter is soft, light weight, and will give you an amazing night's sleep! The only con is it will make you lazy and never want to get out of your bed!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Fu

customer_reviews.title: Color is a wee-bit off
customer_reviews.text: Listed as gray and Navy Blue. To me Navy blue is a dark blue. This is a very light blue. Don't get me wrong it isn't a baby blue just not as dark as I was expecting. It is still a very nice comforter and I'm keeping it, I just wanted others to know that it isn't a deep dark blue like I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: ShipShap3

customer_reviews.title: Really nice feel but order larger size than you need for coverage as shown
customer_reviews.text: It feels great and I like how light it is but keeps the best temps. Had to knock off a few stars as it does not hang that long as it does in the photo of over the bed. Seems like maybe they are using a king size over a full size bed. Not cool with the misrepresentation that creates. My Queen does not fill out the queen duvet at all. We got a good price so will put this in the spare room - darn shame because we really wanted to get more of them but not true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Say what?

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, lightweight; stain on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The duvet itself is lightweight and versatile, and it seems well made. The material is soft and the filling is well distributed and stats that way after washing. I knocked off a couple stars because of the hassle of dealing with - and not being able to completely remove - a stain that was on the duvet when I got it. The item was vacuum sealed on arrival, so it's not something that would have happened during shipping. Otherwise the item is fine, and not worth the hassle to return - just wish this hasn't fallen through the quality control cracks.
customer_reviews.author: Grace M.

customer_reviews.title: Better Quality than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: A key for duvet filler to stay in place are “loops” to fasten Corners inside duvet. I cannot believe I forgot to check this feature prior to ordering. Sure enough, when opened today 4 loops on each corner Of the Queen Duvet Filler. Very happy with comfort, light weight, and fill. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer, Sharpsburg GA

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to purchase another one. I bought the queen size for my guest bed room, and will be purchasing one in king size for my bed. I love it, it's light weight but warm. It washes and dries well. I have it on the guest room bed all 4 seasons. It's cool in the summer with just a sheet and the comforter; and has a cozy feel with sheet and a blanket for the winter. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Warm but Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I recently traded in my heavy-weight tog duvet from Ireland for the Equinox comforter. When the Equinox comforter arrived I was concerned - it was thinish and lightweight, especially when compared to my dependable heavy-weight tog duvet. But I figured I'd give it a go and see how it went and I was really surprised - although it is thinner, it was quite warm nonetheless. It's below freezing right now in NYC and my heat is only "okay" but this mattress felt totally sufficient. It's not super warm, its not cold, its the proverbial "just right." Honestly I think it was a steal at just $30.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Care instructions didn't care for my comforter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this comforter and loved it at first glance, that was until I washed it. I followed the care instructions to a T and somehow it still manged to get destroyed in the washer. It now has a large hole in the bottom of the comforter and lost a bunch of the stuffing too. It's too bad because I really liked this comforter for it's comfort, size, and warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light-medium comforter for year-round use!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by how feather-light and soft to the touch this comforter is. It's very comfortable and has just the right degree of "drape" so that it isn't totally mushy -- it retains enough shape to cover you the way a comforter should -- without being stiff in any way. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I was intrigued by the price and the fact that it was supposed to be light weight and cool yet still feel like a down. Well, I have only had it a few months-it is not cooling, it is thin but gets hot and it’s already coming apart at the gauze like stuffing is coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Morlan

customer_reviews.title: Comforter review
customer_reviews.text: It weighs more than I thought it would, but otherwise is fine. I am keeping it, but thought it would be fluffier.
customer_reviews.author: F. F. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: great so far!
customer_reviews.text: we ordered this for the winter here in israel. so far so good. great price, feels soft, and is reversible. probably not as soft as something more expensive, but you are more than welcome to pay more and get something made out of unicorn feathers or something. would order again (in fact i did order again) #ourequinoxfam @equinoxdeals
customer_reviews.author: DMV Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and was almost immediately disappointed. This is NOT Crimson Red. The seller needs to look at the definition of what Crimson Red is. This is more of a Rust (Orangish/Reddish) color. I also didn’t find this to be very soft. I’m returning it and will just stick with my old comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Love the look but it's not as "light weigh"' as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is super cute ( I love that it's reversible). However, it's definitely not "All Season" I loved this blanket at first (April) then summer came and I took it off my bed so quickly after waking up sweating a few times..
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Big & Fluffy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comforter for my guest room. It's soft and fluffy and very nice to cover up with on a cold night. I can't speak to how it will be in warmer months since it's winter now. However, as far as comfort goes it's very nice to surround yourself with at bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Sheshered

customer_reviews.title: Soft, lightweight, and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Simply love it. I found this to be a great value for the price and based on my recommendation, a family member has already purchased one. It is quite warm but very lightweight. I have not washed it yet, so I cannot speak on that. I'm very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: RJR

customer_reviews.title: got bed bugs!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a new $2000 mattress prior to getting this. Now I got bed bugs. GROSS. Had to hire a company to get rid of them. After reading the other reviews I'm not the only one that has had this bed bug issue with this comforter. BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: A.S.N.

customer_reviews.title: So soft and washable
customer_reviews.text: True to description. I love this comforter it's so soft and wonderful and light. I washed in my washer with NO problems and dried with no problems in my dryer. No shrinkage or tears. Before I bought this comforter I read all the reviews I was a little hesitant on the washing part. However it wash and dried with no problem. I love that you can do this with out taking it to the dry cleaners. I Will purchase another one for my spare bedrooms. Another thing I loved that it came with the tie springs already attached to tie down your comforter in a duvet cover.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Soft blankie
customer_reviews.text: Well...I ordered this blanket in 2018 in solid white. We loved it so much however, with 2 dogs, the white color is no longer a pristine white! I went to my orders and just hit the order again button. What I received is not the same thing. This blanket (the one I am actually reviewing) is super soft but it is way warmer than we like it to be. I realized after I had washed it and it came vaccum packed in a small box. So now I am stuck with it! If you like really warm soft blankets than this is the one for you!
customer_reviews.author: abby stouffer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this comforter
customer_reviews.text: I really like this comforter. It fluffed up as soon as I opened it up. The only thing I didn't like was that it didn't come in any other color than white and doesn't cover the top mattress despite the fact I ordered the largest size. It is very soft and comfy. It is warm now in AZ with our temps at 107* but would be a good transition from your light summer covering to your winter coverings.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Clobes

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect amount of blanket!! Not too hot, not to cold, just right! I was afraid it was going to be too hot but it definitely is not! Excellent purchase for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Very very pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Very very pleasantly surprised! This comforter is by FAR the best, fluffiest comforter I've purchased so far. The weight is enough for a comfortable sleep but not so heavy my toddler can't push it off :) For the price, the quality is AWESOME! I will be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: MGraczyk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic purchase! I bought two of these in queen size. Can’t beat the price or quality Light weight but keeps me warm. Seams are sewn well. I put the one for my bed in a duvet cover. Looks very nice on the bed. I purchased the second one for my Amstaff Terrier. She doesn’t like dog beds. I folded it in half and provides a nice cushion for her. Even folded in half, she can stretch out. She nestled into it immediately. Guess I can say we are both very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: DiAne

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. Keep in mind you get what you pay for so I wasn't expecting the feeling of a down blanket. I was however extremely pleased at how soft it really feels though. It's lightweight but super comfy and machine washable which I love. I will def order this again, its too good of a deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER soft! I was expecting something of low quality when only paying $30, and counted on the fact that I’d put a duvet cover over it. I couldn’t believe how soft it was, I used it without a cover for nearly two months and now that I do have a cover on it, I’m tempted to take it off! It is a very warm but light blanket. Definitely better for winter than the summer, but a good choice either way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice comforter
customer_reviews.text: Washes and dries very well and holds up in a machine washer and electric dryer. The dryer doesn't get it completely dry, which makes sense since there is so much material, so then we hang dry it over a railing for maybe a day. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: P G

customer_reviews.title: Smart buy.
customer_reviews.text: It's well made. I have washed it alot and it is like new everytime. We just use it as a white comforter for our master bed and it's pretty. It's just a little thicker than the hotel inserts, but it's lightweight and breathable. Honestly, I'll probably replace all the bedding with these soon because they are good and really affordable and I love that I can throw them in the washer and bleach them if we need.
customer_reviews.author: j. shell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your favorite duvet cover!!!
customer_reviews.text: I made quilts but honestly prefer the feel of a comforter so this allows me to make a quilted duvet cover and this comforter is the perfect weight and structure to put into a duvet. I bought two and I might just get a king size one for my daughter in law's quilt.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Crutchfield

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTER IS NOT THICK OR WARM
customer_reviews.text: When I did a search for a twin comforter, I specifically put fluffy and warm. This came up and I read the reviews and went ahead and purchased it. This comforter is more like a SHEET. It’s not full or fluffy at all. I am so disappointed that I wasted money on this. It has a very strong odor to it that I can’t even stomach. I’m convinced the reviews were paid reviews. There’s no way anyone thinks this is a strong, fluffy, durable comforter. I am warmer with a thin sheet!
customer_reviews.author: verogooz

customer_reviews.title: Unraveling after one wash
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. Loved this comforter when I first got it.. I was really impressed! So much so that I recommended it to my mother and she also bought one. That only lasted until I washed it. When I removed it from the washer, I noticed that one of the quilted squares had “torn” from one side to the other, almost as if thread had unraveled and created a hole because the filling was coming out. So it has ended up just being a waste of money which is a real bummer. Although affordable, it seems it may not be the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Adams

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Your Money
customer_reviews.text: So, the comforter is great for about a month and then it goes downhill from there. First few months it started to create lint pieces in my laundry so we had to get a whole new machine. I'm a sweaty sleeper, and this blanket did nothing but help my puddle expand! Last few months it was a hassle to get the smell out, I tossed this garbage where it belonged.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

product_meta.title: Equinox All-Season White Quilted Comforter - 88 x 88 Inches - Goose Down Alternative Queen Comforter - Duvet Insert Set - Machine Washable - Plush Microfiber Fill (350 GSM)
feature_bullets: Like sleeping under a cloud; Cozy up with this luxurious down alternative comforter; Extremely soft 100% brushed microfiber cover with 6D hollow siliconized fiber filling lulls you into a tranquil restful sleep

Superior comfort and design; The elegant square style stitching with piped edges keeps the siliconized gel fill from shifting, so you always have a plush, fluffy comforter that retains its shape; Clean crisp look complements any room décor or style
Safe for those with sensitive skin; protects again mildew, dust mites; Super soft brushed microfiber cover won’t irritate your sensitive skin

Versatile and won’t weigh you down; Use the comforter as is or use it with a duvet comforter to change the look; Comes in either Queen (88” x 88”), King (102" x 90") or Twin (68" x 86") size but unlike traditional comforters won’t weigh you down in your sleep

Easy cleaning and storage; To clean, wash in cold water by hand or in your machine on the gentle cycle, air dry or tumble dry on low; Comes with protective plastic zippered case for easy storing and packing

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars6,156 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
